name: Hold My Tower
description:
New Update released 27.8.2020 ~

- 2 levels and a tutorial added

- balancing changes

1. Decreased the slow rate of laser

2. Purple enemies now drop 100$ instead of 120$

3. Some sound effects and a new music added

4. A japanese theme added!

5. New japanese boss with Katana!!

6. After completing the 4th stage the menu changed to japanese theme

Oh no! We have been attacked by dem circle boiz!! 

Glad i had this turret in my pocket!

Very basic tower defense game based with various themes

Ya got three turrets

But wait what

ENEMIES are different types!?

That one runs fast!!

What turret shall i use for that hmm?

Enjoy!
